books.author: by Peter Schweizer
books.description: The author of “Red-Handed” depicts a scheme involving the Chinese Communist Party’s covert operations in America.
books.name: BLOOD MONEY

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.description: A look at recent scientific research on aging and longevity.
books.name: OUTLIVE

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The survivors of a shipwrecked British vessel on a secret mission during an imperial war with Spain have different accounts of events.
books.name: THE WAGER

books.author: by RuPaul
books.description: The multiple Emmy Award-winning producer of “RuPaul’s Drag Race” traces his journey from his childhood in San Diego to becoming a pop culture icon.
books.name: THE HOUSE OF HIDDEN MEANINGS

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Marilynne Robinson
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning author of “Gilead” illuminates the literary aspects of the Bible’s first book.
books.name: READING GENESIS

books.author: by Liz Cheney
books.description: The former congresswoman from Wyoming recounts how she helped lead the Select Committee to Investigate the Jan. 6. Attack on the United States Capitol.
books.name: OATH AND HONOR

books.author: by Kara Swisher
books.description: The tech journalist and podcast host gives an overview of the tech industry and the foibles of its founders.
books.name: BURN BOOK

books.author: by Kai Bird and Martin J. Sherwin
books.description: A biography of J. Robert Oppenheimer. Winner of the Pulitzer Prize in 2006 and an inspiration for the film “Oppenheimer.”
books.name: AMERICAN PROMETHEUS

books.author: by Jim Sciutto
books.description: The CNN anchor and chief national security analyst examines shifts in the global order, including how they impact technology and the web.
books.name: THE RETURN OF GREAT POWERS

books.author: by Abigail Shrier
books.description: Shrier makes her case that the mental health industry has a negative impact on American children.
books.name: BAD THERAPY

books.author: with an introduction, annotations and supporting materials by Melissa Murray and Andrew Weissmann
books.description: Four criminal indictments against the former president.
books.name: THE TRUMP INDICTMENTS

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The story of the American rowers who pursued gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympic Games; the basis of the film.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Donald L. Miller
books.description: An account of the American Eighth Air Force in World War II; the basis of the TV series.
books.name: MASTERS OF THE AIR
